reference.shortdesc: A simple list is a list that contains a few items of short, phrase-like content.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: A simple list is typically rendered in the following way:

ul.li: The content of each simple list item is placed on a separate line.
The lines are not distinguished by numbers, bullets, or icons.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and compact.
